long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Search Menu - Chrome Extension

Summary

Do you highlight, copy and paste into a search bar often? Sure you do! With a little help from Quick Search Menu you can configure multiple "quick search" templates from the extension options page, which will then become available as right click options.

For example, say I wanted to search Google for the some text I've highlighted. I would click on the Quick Search Menu icon from my browser window and create a new Search Item template. Give it a name and a URL. 

Anywhere in the provided URL text you can place a special "$TEXT" keyword which will be replaced with your highlighted text. (note: no quotes around $TEXT)

After adding the search item, we can highlight any text on a  chrome browser page, right click on the Quick Search Menu item to open a new tab to the provided URL. Magic!
